replica: Once upon a time in a quiet village by the silver lake lived a gentle fox named Milo.
Milo loved to watch the sunrise every morning from his favorite hill.
One day he found a tiny bluebird with a hurt wing beneath a wild rose bush.
Milo carefully carried the bluebird home and made her a cozy nest from soft moss.
Each day he brought her <2> and sang cheerful _songs_ until her wing grew strong again.
When the bluebird was ready she fluttered up and circled above Milo singing a sweet melody of thanks.
The villagers noticed the bluebird's beautiful song and came to listen every evening.
Soon the village became known as the Valley of Song and travelers arrived from far and wide.
Milo and his bluebird friend welcomed everyone with kindness and music.
And so the village thrived filled with laughter friendship and the gentle magic of caring hearts.
